tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robotic_surgeries (
    patient_id INT,
    surgery_date DATE,
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(50),
    procedure_type VARCHAR(50),
    surgery_duration DECIMAL(5,2),
    outcomes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE robotic_surgeries (
    surgery_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    surgeon_id UUID,
    surgery_date DATE,
    duration_minutes INT,
    complication BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE surgeries (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  surgeon_id INT,
  date DATE,
  procedure_type VARCHAR(50),
  outcome VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE surgeons (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  specialty VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE instruments (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE complications (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  surgery_id INT,
  complication_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE RobotSurgeries (
    surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(50),
    surgery_date DATE,
    surgery_duration TIME,
    outcome VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Surgeons (
    surgeon_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(50),
    specialization VARCHAR(50),
    experience_years INT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    warranty_period INT
)

CREATE TABLE SurgicalNotes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    surgery_id INT,
    note_date TIMESTAMP,
    note_text TEXT
)
